execute

public boolean execute(java.lang.String action,
                       JSONArray args,
                       CallbackContext callbackContext)
                throws JSONException
Executes the plugin request and returns PluginResult.

Parameters:
action - The action to exectute
args - JSONArray of arguments for the plugin (possibly starting with version)
callbackContext - Used when calling back into Javascript.
Returns:
A PluginResult object with a status and message.
Throws:
JSONException

                                   JavaScriptPluginVersion jsVersion,
                                   JSONArray args,

Parameters:

args - JSONArray of arguments for the plugin.
callbackContext - Used when calling back into Javascript.

Whether the action was valid.
